Christa Mackinnon

Website: christamackinnon.com

Christa Mackinnon is the founder and director of 'Bridging the Worlds Training' and and the co-founder of ‘Women Weaving Change’ and of ‘The Modern Medicine Woman Training School’. She is the author of Shamanism and Spirituality in Therapeutic Practice, Singing Dragon Editions, Jessica Kingsley Publishers and the author of ’Shamanism Made Easy - Awaken and Develop the Shamanic Force Within’, Hay House International.

David Sparenberg , Christa Mackinnon
April 2013
